source:
%%pyspark
blob_account_name = "lxistaeus"
blob_container_name = "testdate2"
from pyspark.sql import SparkSession

sc = SparkSession.builder.getOrCreate()
token_library = sc._jvm.com.microsoft.azure.synapse.tokenlibrary.TokenLibrary
blob_sas_token = token_library.getConnectionString("sta2")

spark.conf.set(
    'fs.azure.sas.%s.%s.blob.core.windows.net' % (blob_container_name, blob_account_name),
    blob_sas_token)
df = spark.read.load('wasbs://testdate2@lxistaeus.blob.core.windows.net/test-02.csv', format='csv'
## If header exists uncomment line below
##, header=True
)
display(df.limit(3345))
